tasks.task: Checking planting depth and field conditions during agricultural operations.
subtasks: Leaving the comfort of the tractor or sprayer cab.
Exiting the field to get a firsthand assessment of tillage and planting equipment performance.
Using tools such as a pocket knife or the "old knuckle method" to gauge planting depth.
Employing a leaf blower to remove loose soil from the seed trench.
Inspecting the seed trench to evaluate row unit performance and soil compaction.
Observing signs of sidewalk compaction and seed placement accuracy.
Assessing the effectiveness of closure wheels in sealing the seed trench.
